data.text: @CICG --> Once you've purchased your ticket, you can send us your booking code (PRN) and we'll send you a weblink to process the payment to add your pet in cabin. Should you need any further info, please feel free to contact us here anytime. BR/Michaela

@CICG Hi Cristobal! We're truly sorry for our delayed response but we're happy to confirm that there's room for your pet on the flight you mentioned. Yet, as we do not accept emotional pets, this service is suject to a charge of 50€ each way -->

@txamae Hi M.Elena,
we're terribly sorry to hear this and truly apologize for the inconvenience. Would you be so kind as to send us all the details of your flight via DM? BR/Michaela

@alex_mallet Hi Alex, we are very sorry to hear this and truly apologize for the inconveniences caused. Would you be so kind as to send us per DM your booking reference, in order to assist you further? Thanks in advance for your understanding. BR/MIchaela

@a_schaefermeier @lufthansa Lieber Andreas, wir entschuldigen uns sehr für alle Unannehmlichkeiten. Wenn Sie uns eine aktuelle Email Adresse per DM geben könnten, wird eine Kollegin unserer Customer Service Abteilung in Kürze mit Ihnen Kontakt aufnehmen. BR/Michaela

data.text: @WndlustMarriage We're glad you enjoyed your stay in Italy! We look forward to welcoming you on board soon again! 😊
@west_david3 Got it! 👍 Thank you so much! We'll reply via DM.

@west_david3 Hi David, we are terribly sorry and apologize for the inconveniences caused. Would you be so kind as to provide us with your booking references per DM, as to retrieve your request and process it as soon as possible? BR/Michaela
@WndlustMarriage We are super happy to hear this! 😊Thank you for reaching out and letting us know that it ended well. We wish you all the best and a wonderful stay in Italy!

Congrats @MUC_Airport! 👏👏👏
#NetZero2050 https://t.co/V3GI0sS6dH
RT @MUC_Airport: Those who want to be successful must not stand still in their development. Munich Airport is already preparing for future…

@MimmoMinunni Buongiorno gentile Domenico, ci scusiamo molto per il disagio e tutti gli inconvenienti. Per poter verificare internamente, ci conferma gentilmente che il suo nome reale è Domenico Minunni? /Laure
@eddiehulme Dear Mr, we are terrible sorry and will forward your feedback to the dpt in charge. Would you kindly confirm that the flight was on June 21st? BR/Laure
@zrhspotters_ch Wow 😍 what an amazing shot!

@WndlustMarriage Dear Wanderlust Marriage, we are terrible sorry and do really apologize. In order to help you further could you please send us via DM, as sensitive data, feedback ID of the lost&found, full passenger name? Many Thanks/Laure

data.text: @alankkan Dear Alan Kan, many thanks for the details. We already submitted, also you suggestion, to our Customer Relation dpt. Should you be needing anything else, we are at your disposal 😊
@FarneseVini Thank you very much, it's a pleasure! 😊

@alankkan Good morning dear Alan Kan, we are terribly sorry and do apologize. In order to check with the dpt in charge would you kindly send us, via dm as sensitive data, flight number, day and your name. BR/Laure
@Eklatante https://t.co/jg6MdhlMEc

@MULUC9 @chubby_charlton Dear Muluc, we are terribly sorry. In this case we kindly invite you to fill in formal claim at customer-relations@airdolomiti.it should you be needing anything else we remain at your disposal. Best/Laure

@PCBhagwat Dear Mr Bhagwat, we are terribly sorry to read that and do apologize. In order to forward your feedback, would you kindly send us via DM flight number and day? Looking forward to hearing from you. BR/Laure
@LuTerronPower Mannaggia! Sarà per la prossima volta allora https://t.co/wyXEoaJCL3
@ChubbyCharlton @FlorenceAirport @MUC_Airport Dear Gordon, we are really really sorry and do apologize. Would you be so kind to send us via DM flight number and day in other to check? BR/Laure
@jblachowski Thank you ✈️ glad you enjoyed it! https://t.co/95ocTRas2z

@chubby_charlton Dear Gordon thank you very much for your suggestion 😉 we are terribly sorry and do apologize. Would you be so kind to send us via DM the flight number and day in order to check and get back to you? BR/Laure
@LuTerronPower Beh se non solo per il fascino, ma anche altro ci aspettavamo un 10 allora 😉

Today our President visited the new Air Dolomiti’s #FlyingAcademy. For many, becoming a pilot is a dream come true but it requires commitment and dedication. Thus, what better wish than the motto: “Per aspera #AdAstra”, through hardships… to the stars! https://t.co/3g9xNo2mUO
@MULUC9 Good morning dear Muluc, we are terribly sorry and do truly apologize. Would you be so kind to send us flight number and day via DM in order to check and get back to you. BR/Laure
@inner64 Many thanks, we v dm'd back!

@inner64 Good morning dear Brian, we totally understand your point and do really apologize. May we help you anyhow? Would you be so kind to send us via DM flight nr and day in order to check? BR/Laure
@BLQairport @FabrizioBerni @PITISPOTTERCLUB Buon venerdì anche a voi 😍✈️

Discover the contemporary side to Rennaissance Florence and see how Prato has made the most of its industrial past to develop a new calendar of cultural events with our creative itinerary of these two fascinating cities on the #AirDolomitiBlog 👈 https://t.co/FeqNVdgh8d

💃🎻 Opera season is is not only about lyrics. The Opera season is also about emotions, love, customs and so much more. 🎻💃

What are you waiting for? The program of the Verona Arena Opera Festival 2019 is out! 

 https://t.co/XU9ngx5lRS
How come you we ask you to turn your mobile phone off during a flight? Today on the #AirDolomitiBlog we try to explain it as simply as possible 😉 https://t.co/I2NFugR8Ry

@laurajane7893 Good morning dear Laura, we are terribly sorry for all these inconveniences and do apologize. Would you be so kind to send us further details, such as flight number day and real name via private message? BR/Laure

@saragoldberger Thank you so much for your kind words. 😊 We've passed your comments on to the crew. They're always happy to receive our passengers' compliments, as one of their main goals is to make the experience with us as enjoyable as possible.
We look forward to welcoming y
@annapaolaconcia Molto onorati di ciò! Le auguriamo una splendida giornata e l'aspettiamo a bordo 😉
@P_Grenville Good morning dear Mr Grenville, would you kindly send us via DM, as sensitive data, feedback number of the file reference opened at the lost&found? Best/Laure

We're sure you've heard of an auto pilot, but only our trusty #avgeeks, who outdo each other with their comments, truly know how it works! 😉 For everyone else there's the #AirDolomitiBlog.  https://t.co/FFlWlI9fVS

North of #Verona lies a place that could easily have sprung forth from the end of Tolkien's pen. You won't be able to escape stories of wolves, bears and sacred dances on your next trip to #Lessinia. Explore the area in our🌲#AlternativeGuide🌲https://t.co/zKLW5XfwJ2 https://t.co/EyN8cYBYma

@LeonardMiron Thank you so much, hope to welcome you soon again on board 😍✈️

data.text: So many men and women have contributed to the history of aviation. Today, we wanted to tell you about one in particular, who at just 25 years old accomplished something truly extraordinary. Find out more on the #AirDolomitiBlog   https://t.co/WJkGCPquRS
